info.name: userstyles.org Orange with black tabs
info.description: This template/code takes the boring old userstyles and turns it into an amazing orange cool thingy. Lol. For any reference you give out, or show in any video, please put a small reference in the corner saying By: K. Rampling. Enjoy Orange Google With Shadow! **Sorry if screenshots are unreadable. This is due to the picture being to large and taking up too much memory on the site.**
